import React, { useState } from 'react' import './CartItemStyles.css' import Modal from 'react-modal' import { customStyles } from '../../Course/CourseItem/CourseItem' export const CartItem : React.FC = ({id, title, author, price, discountedPrice, isAddedToCart}) => { const[isDeletedOpen, setDeletedIsOpen] = useState(false) return (
setDeletedIsOpen(false)} style={customStyles} >

Item removed form Cart successfully
{title} {author}
{price}
) }
